description:
Kei’s life changes forever when he sees a beautiful female alien materialize on the shore of a lake. But was it all just a dream? The next day a woman who looks just like her turns out to be his new teacher!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bring es mir bitte bei, Sensei!
สอนผมด้วยเถอะครับอาจารย์
